10.title: Double Trouble

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Stacey is a girl who usually gets what she wants - but the dress she's dreaming about is on another bride. Keasha tries to convince the other bride's consultant to share the dress, but it takes an intervention with manager Elise to get the girls to play fair. And this week the store goes international. While a Hong Kong bride gets fitted down in Alterations, Claudia has a bride in from Slovakia with a tight budget. Fortunately, Claudia found her the perfect dress. Unfortunately, her bride absolutely can't afford it. The only thing left for Claudia to do is beg the ...

11.title: Picky Is Tricky

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Rookie consultant Claudia needs to prove she can sell. She's been in a slump lately so manager Elise puts her with an "easy" bride. But even with a ringer, the "easy" sale evaporates and puts Claudia on very thin ice. Nicole Sacco, on the other hand, is having a great day. She's gotten a promotion to head up the Alterations department. But Nicole's people skills will be severely tested by a very anxious bride and her irate family. The bride's father confronts the designer about the flaws he sees in the gown and demands a totally new dress. While Nicole gets that ...

13.title: Musical Matrimony

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Marjorie's enlisted her family and friends to help find a dress for her wedding in just two months. Lynette's at style odds with her family and friends. After putting her wedding reception on hold for 5 years, Dana is about to walk down the aisle.

17.title: Sister Sister

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Having beaten ovarian cancer, bride Gemma wants the perfect gown for her wedding in Thailand. Plus, Emma seeks a figure hugging dress after losing four stone!

19.title: She Shops She Scores

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: A wedding is a family event, but should they decide on the dress? Nicola wants a timeless gown but her mom and grandmother want her to wear one of their dresses! Yasmin falls in love with a dress, but does mom?

20.title: Mom Matters Most

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Emma is looking for a fairytale gown to match her wedding, but will dad and David see eye to eye? Meanwhile tomboy Emma steps outside her comfort zone and into a gown.

1.title: Men on Deck

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Natalie arrives with her stylish best friend Leo who is tasked with giving her the male perspective on each dress, while Amber brings her brother, who has offered to pay for her dream dress.

2.title: Preconceived Notions

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Amy only wants a fitted wedding dress, but soon feels confused when she loves how a ball gown looks. Ainsley always envisioned wearing a lace dress, but none of the lace gowns wow her. Can these brides let go of their original visions to find "the one"?

3.title: Fashion Forward

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Today, some very stylish entourage members help brides find the most fashion-forward gowns! Lily brings her godmother and fashion icon, Jeanne Beker, to weigh in on the perfect dress. Qwyn takes advice from her mom, a fashion stylist who lives in Milan.

4.title: Kids at Play

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Janie has made her appointment a true family affair! Helping her choose her dress is her fiance and their two young children. Alyssa is looking for a gown that can also be replicated to fit her two-year-old daughter, so that they match on the big day!

5.title: Family Feud

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Jenny arrives with her mom and brother who voice hatred for the dress she loves, while Kristina fields comments from her mom and three sisters, all of whom have conflicting visions for the dress.

9.title: Body Issues

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Every bride deserves to wear that perfect dress that makes her feel amazing. Rosie is just under 5 feet tall, and she'd like a gown that will make her look and feel taller on her big day. Jamieson wants a dress that can help create an hourglass shape.

15.plot: Amber arrives needing a dramatic ball gown to fit her "Guns and Glitter" themed wedding, while Kathleen wants a ball gown that her sister loves and has enough coverage for her church ceremony.

16.title: Let There Be Lace

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Sometimes finding the perfect wedding dress is all about the fabric! Melissa arrives convinced chiffon will be best for her beach wedding, but is unsure when she tries on a lace gown. Lindsay knows she wants lace, but the right type proves hard to find.

imdb.plot outline: It's the one dress she's dreamed about her entire life. And everyone has an opinion about it. Between budget and bling, taffeta and tantrums, not to mention the comments and criticisms of an entourage that can turn any bride's fantasy into a nightmare, Say Yes to the Dress Canada brings all of the tears, cheers and surprises to the screen, with our own Canadian flair. The series features a behind-the-scenes look at Amanda-Lina's Bridal Boutique, where a group of resourceful consultants along with a passionate and perceptive Bridal Stylist, Joseph, make dreams come true. Each episode of Say Yes to the Dress Canada, invites viewers to join wide-eyed brides as they face the drama of saying 'yes', before they can walk down the aisle and say 'I do'.
imdb.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada

The series features a behind-the-scenes look at Amanda-Lina's Bridal Boutique, where a group of resourceful consultants along with a passionate and perceptive Bridal Stylist, Joseph, make dreams come true. Each episode of Say Yes to the Dress Canada, invites viewers to join wide-eyed brides as they face the drama of saying 'yes', before they can walk down the aisle and say 'I do'.::W Network
